description.lang: The DCH-G022 is a high performance and secure Connected Home Z-Wave gateway used to control a variety of Z-Wave home sensors to automate your home. The key features are listed below.1. Easy to InstallSimple to set up using the mydlink App for your tablelet and smart phone. Uses D-Link proprietary protocol for easier communication with all your mydlink home devices.2. Wireless 802.11 Wi-Fi3. Z-Wave PlusZ-Wave 500 series chipSpeed up to 100kbps4. SecurityAES 128 bit encryption for Z-WaveWPA/WPA 2 encryption for Wi-Fi
The Lifeline will report Device Reset Locally
